Class Patron

  • java.lang.Object
    • Patron
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Patron>

    public class Patron
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Patron>
    Contains the methods for a patron/borrower for the library.
